title: 253-Monkey King: Severance
itunes:title: 253-Monkey King: Severance
description:
We're back on the road on the Journey to the West and our heroes are starving. The solution? Some murders, some personnel changes, and human buns.

The creature is a devil fish, a not-so-friendly businessfish.
